price: Siku litapo pulizwa barugumu, nanyi mtakuja kwa makundi,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا
footnotes: Siku litakapo pulizwa barugumu na kufufuliwa watu, mtakuja kwenye mkutano makundi kwa makundi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
